level.text: This chapter shall apply to applicants for and holders of a license to practice acupuncture and to physicians collaborating with acupuncturists.
Chapters 40 (Health Occupations: General Rules), 41 (Health Occupations: Administrative Procedures), and 46 (Medicine) of this title shall supplement this chapter.

An applicant for a license under this chapter shall submit with a completed application three (3) letters of reference from physicians experienced in the practice of acupuncture or acupuncturists licensed in the United States, who have personal knowledge of the applicant’s abilities and qualifications to practice acupuncture.
The Board shall maintain a registry of licensed acupuncturists and shall make the registry available to the public for inspection.

level.heading: AUTHORITY
level.text: Unless otherwise noted, the authority for this chapter is ยง 302(14) of the District of Columbia Health Occupations Revision Act of 1985, D.C. Law 6.99, D.C. Code ยง 2-3303.2(14) (1988 Repl. Vol.), 33 DCR 729, 732 (February 7, 1986), and Mayor’s Order 86-110, 33 DCR 5220 (August 22, 1986).

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 36 DCR 7159 (October 13, 1989); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 37 DCR 2747, 2749 (May 4, 1990).
